Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Excellent location, easy access to capital beltway / Route 283, PA Turnpike, & Harrisburg International Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Recently renovated class A office building. Local, reputable ownership and professionally managed building. Various suite configurations available.

New state-of-the-art HVAC system with individual tenant controls, is monitored for operating efficiency 24/7 by a third party.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Location provides easy access to major highways I-81 & I-83.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Exceptional two story building within Commerce Park.  Great user-investor opportunity with 15,000 SF lease buyout. Enterprise Rent-A-Car as anchor tenant on 2nd Floor. Open floor plan with a 8’-9’ ceiling height. 8.3/1,000 SF Parking Ratio.

30,000 SF building for sale at $3,300,000.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on the northwest corner of Market Street in downtown Harrisburg. Within a short walk to PA Capital Complex, Strawberry Square, Amtrak train station, City Island, Riverfront Park, and Second Street’s Restaurant Row. Excellent access to Interstates 83 and 81, Route 22, and the West Shore.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Unbeatable opportunity to lease Class A office space within one of downtown Harrisburg’s most prestigious office properties. The building provides on-site management and security, on-site parking and an array of
amenities.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Up to 38,191 SF of Class A Office Space in Downtown Harrisburg
